drivers.name: foo2qpdl
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This is a driver developed for the Samsung CLP-300/310/315/320/325/360, CLP-600, CLP-610, CLP-620, CLX-2160 (printer only), CLX-3160 (printer only).

And the Xerox Phaser 6110 or Phaser 6110MFP (printer only).

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
The Samsung CLX-3175 (USB) is color laser multifunction printer with a 2008 street price of $590 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2qpdl open software printer driver. Only the printer function is supported by this driver.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (2000 prints) - $54 Toner Yellow (1000 prints) - $45 Toner Magenta (1000 prints) - $45 Toner Cyan (1000 prints) - $45 Waste Toner (5000 prints) - $10 Drum Kit (20000 prints) - $96 Part numbers: CLP-K300A, CLP-Y300A, CLP-M300A, CLP-C300A, CLP-W300A, CLP-R300A
